procure.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to obtain something, especially something that is difficult to get
procure.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He was accused of procuring weapons for terrorists.
procure.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to provide a prostitute for someone
procure.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to obtain something that is needed for a particular task
procure.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Companies in the industry reported difficulty in procuring raw materials.
Investors showed faith in Path√©'s ability to procure the $900 million required to close the deal.
